OMG you guys sound like a right bunch of little bitches!

TC.... DVD SCREENERS, Telecine, screener, dvdscr's,  all that went right over the top of my head!

All most of us in here want to know is whether or not this particular torrent is any good!

Is it really about 'trying to release this to be one of the heroes being first on the scene'? 
HEROES? A bit delusional do you not think?

Nobody actually mentions anything about the quality, not once!

I appreciate and admire uploaders, but some people are getting carried away, we r talking about illegal rips (or wotever) yet EMERY2010 is name dropping all over the place, (slightly threatening)
 KNOCKX2 is practically stalking LOLWOX, admitting that he scans other up-loaders files to see if they actually broke the sweat and god help them if he suspects! (yet, has never uploaded any movie torrentts lol)
THEAWESOME2012 actually says 'so not only is this probably stolen it is a stolen source mislabelled!' 
So what is the issue again?
Stolen torrents, stolen from stolen torrents, stolen from the movie makers (somewhere down the line) HAHA

The way I see it is if there are 2 people with the same (or similar) torrent on offer, and 400 people want it, is it not better if two people are offering it?
Please tell me if I am missing something!
Please, LOLWOX if you are doing whatever then, well first, thanks for taking time to do it I think u rock, but PLEASE can u just admit it if they are re uploaded torrents and say thanks to whoever, cos I think if u r looking for fame & glory, u choose the wrong path!   

And one very lovely uploader, mentioned few times by BLOODY KNOCK, even says 'Love for All and Sharing is the first step to solving all the problems of humanity, 
'No credit for me...credit to EVERYONE for sharing' and 'credit Noir BIG TIME & to all the people who made it possible for me to share this with everyone!
 This person is a huge up-loader yet he never once mentions anyone copying or whatever!
So, basically, get a grip, if u want to comment on the quality of the film, bash on, cos to tell you the truth, when I get up tomorrow I will probably not even remember any of the names I just quoted!
